name: Arne Weise
overview: A Swedish language text and graphics adventure game. Jaktkommando Arne Weise (probably "Hunting Commando Arne Weise") is an adventure game by Swedish programmer Johan Rosengren. The game uses a first person perspective with monochrome illustrations. The controls are menu-driven. You can choose between five commands (use, take, give, go and hit). Arne Weise is the name of a Swedish journalist and TV host who was very famous in Sweden.
